resources.string: To an uneducated, an A is just 3 sticks.
Data unavailable due to some unreliable sources.

string-array.name: starttexts
string-array.item: Real time information of your current day classes.
All your registered courses filtered with location.
Marks, Grades and Conclusions, all at one place.
Total and day-wise attendance available. Also track your future attendance.
VIT Vellore campus map to know where-to\'s.
